title: Under Armour Men's Tech Golf Polo
description: Textured fabric that's soft, light & breathable
Material wicks sweat & dries really fast
Loose: Fuller cut for complete comfort.

UA Tech™ is our original go-to training gear: Under Armour men's Tech polos are loose, light, and keep you cool. Basically, they're built to be everything you need. Textured fabric that's soft, light & breathable. Material wicks sweat & dries really fast. 3-button placket. Self-fabric collar. Loose: Fuller cut for complete comfort. 100% Polyester.
